name: bitclock
description: A clock made of binary integers to help you practice reading binary.
author: Eric Slenk <lucid.machine@gmail.com>

scripts.reset: git clean -dfx && git reset --hard && npm i
scripts.clean: for d in build test; do if [ -d "$d" ]; then rm -r $d; fi; done
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:unit
scripts.watch: npm run build && webpack --watch & jest --env=jsdom --watch & wait
scripts.cov: npm run build && jest --env=jsdom --coverage && firefox build/coverage/index.html
scripts.publish: npm run build && gh-pages -m "[ci skip] Updates" -d dist
